author: ansgar.eth
content: Hey all, another update: We have built an AA testnet playground that includes the MVP AA implementation in geth and a forked version of solidity with basic support for writing AA contracts. We walk through the geth and solidity setup and two example contracts: a simple hello world white board dapp and a more interesting smart contract wallet using the `ecrecover` precompile. We show how to deploy these example contracts and create your first AA transactions for them.

author: will7466
content: The AA smart contract wallet is here - https://github.com/quilt/account-abstraction-playground/blob/master/contracts/Wallet.sol
